tags: Curls blogs about Boku no Hero Academia
summary: Finished reading the new BNHA chapter and oh my God they’re making implications of One for All and All for One being one in the...
body:
Finished reading the new BNHA chapter and oh my God they’re making implications of One for All and All for One being one in the same…..and AFO having a parallel/link to Izuku?! Maybe???! Oh maaaaan yessss more fuel to the AFO dad theory.

Really enjoyed Bakugou being a part of All Might and Izuku’s conversation about One For All and his part in the conversation help get straight to certain points of this new discovery of Izuku’s quirk.

AIZAWA BACKSTORY WHAT, WHO IS THIS CHARACTER HIM AND MIC BROUGHT UP??

Also MIRIO AND ERI COMING BACK YESSSS I MISSED THEM! We were able to learn about how Monoma’s quirk works and Eri’s quirk being a stockpile type of quirk omg. I had a feeling Monoma was bluffing about having copied OFA during the class fight. Good thing too or else he would have been seriously hurt.

Also can we just gush about how much Aizawa cares for Eri? He called Monoma over to be able to teach her about using her quirk and brought her emotional support brothers to help her not get scared ahhh so sweet!

Overall, this was an enjoyable chapter with a lot more new info and I can’t wait to see what this new arc will be about!

question: 33 with Kaminari please ? ^^
answer:
33. An unexpected kiss that shocks the one receiving it.

Oh wow, no Dabi this time, Katsura?? I’m shocked!! Enjoy!!! 

You were an absolutely electric person in the eyes of Kaminari. Why, he hasn’t laid his eyes on anyone as beautiful as you before. He didn’t think such beauty existed until he saw you for the first time and he made it his mission to get to know you since that day. A couple of months later and the two of you grew closer to where your relationship were teetering on the edge of friendship and lovers. Everyone around you assumed you were dating already, even your parents often called Kaminari your boyfriend whenever you told them you were going to meet up with him. There were times when he would hold your hand while he walked you home, and silence would be a welcoming friend between you two. The two of you would avoid each other’s gaze and feel the heat of your clasped hands, the roughness of his palms from training, and the pleasant shock of his touch whenever his hand would lightly squeeze yours. It was only a matter of time before Kaminari would finally get the guts to confess his love for you.

“Thank you, Denki…” You blushed and took the large stuffed Pikachu plushie from his hands and held it to your chest. He had just gone through an excruciatingly long battle with the crane machine, spending almost all of his money to win you a plushie. He knew how much of a scam most of these machines were, but he couldn’t ignore that glimmer in your eyes when you saw them. You tried to convince him to quit when he lost a couple of times but with one dazzling smile of his had you believing in him.

“See? Told you I’ll win it for you!” He grinned a grin so confident, it had you chuckling. The sound was music to his ears.

“I love it so much!” You squeezed the plushie in your arms and Kaminari wished he was in its place, in between your arms and against your body. “Really, Denki… Seriously, thank you.” Lightning struck through his heart at the sight of your lovely smile, it rocked at his soul and his cheeks flared up in red. His hands grew clammy as he couldn’t lift his gaze from the brightness of your eyes. Certainly, to Kaminari, you were the most beautiful person he ever saw.

His lips were sudden, pressed against yours in an act of his urges. His clammy hands were latched onto your arms and pressed into your skin. It was like static had surged from the connection and burrowed down within your body and froze you. You didn’t relax in his hold at all even when he pulled away, visibly in panic about his actions.

“I-I… didn’t… I—” But you silenced him with a kiss of your own when you had recovered from your shock, sending Kaminari into his own spell of disbelief.

summary: my favorite thing is from season 2 of bnha, the pre-final exam episode or whatever, when midoriya just starts to use 5% of OFA...
body:
my favorite thing is from season 2 of bnha, the pre-final exam episode or whatever, when midoriya just starts to use 5% of OFA and shows off and bakugou confronts him about it and in the english dub he basically tells midoriya it’s pissing him off

idk it’s just so funny cos like

bakugou deadass just goes

“i don’t know what’s going on with your power, but it’s SERIOUSLY pissing me off.”

then he just like… LEAVES

WHAT A FUCKING POWER MOVE
